first_para: Andrew Lambrou Charalambous is a British businessman and political candidate. Charalambous is the national housing and environment spokesman for the United Kingdom Independence Party. He is currently UKIP parliamentary candidate for the constituency of North East Cambridgeshire.

full.extract: Andrew Lambrou Charalambous is a British businessman and political candidate. Charalambous is the national housing and environment spokesman for the United Kingdom Independence Party. He is currently UKIP parliamentary candidate for the constituency of North East Cambridgeshire.
full.title: Andrew Charalambous
